The cab detailing is good and there are

294.77.text:
In summary this is a very good looking
model by Motorart

297.76.text:
and its definite main plus point is the
high standard of the detailing.

301.88.text:
The functionality of the model doesn't
achieve the same high standard

305.70.text:
but overall the model is of good quality
